config.name: XXE Attack using UTF-7
config.description: Some simple blacklisting countermeasures can probably bypassed by changing the default XML charset (which is UTF-8), to a different one, for example, UTF-16. To convert it to UTF-16, you can use the linux tool iconv: "cat file.xml | iconv -f UTF-8 -t UTF-7 > file_utf7.xml"
